amendment.description: To provide that appropriations under this Act may not be used for the purpose of providing certain grants, unless all such grants meet certain conditions for allocation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4634 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 64. Record Vote Number: 198.

action.text: Amendment SA 4634 proposed by Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S7399-7401, S7484-7485, S7485-7486; text as modified: CR S7399) To provide that appropriations under this Act may not be used for the purpose of providing certain grants, unless all such grants meet certain conditions for allocation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4634 proposed by Senator Menendez.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4634 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 64. Record Vote Number: 198.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4634 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 64. Record Vote Number: 198.
